attributes.action: Stop calories on menus and do not introduce them
attributes.additional_details: The government has decided to introduce this policy so the government needs to be the one who stops it.
attributes.background: Just extremely recently, it has come out that in the government plan to tackle obesity restaurants and cafes with over 250 employees will have to put calories on their menus. this is extremely harmful for people suffering or who have suffered from eating disorders and creates a toxic mindset

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585685
